name: Vikings Can Fly! - Chase of the Valkyrie
name_original: Vikings Can Fly! - Chase of the Valkyrie
description:
Bjorn is a clumsy Viking inventor, always frowned upon by his friends because of his crazy machines. One day, Bjorn finds himself in front of the most beautiful sight of his life: an amazing Valkyrie!
It’s love at first sight …even though the disdainful Valkyrie rejects Bjorn and returns to the Valhalla. But nothing can stop an enamoured Viking: Bjorn will put all his inventions to good use, to fly to the Valhalla and conquer his damsel…

Take off from the Village and try to fly as far as possible, tilting the device to your posture. Eventually you’ll fall to the ground, but don’t lose faith! While flying, you can exploit air currents and collect gold nuggets: spend them at yout laboratory and unlock tons of new crazy inventions, skills and consumables to improve your flying performance.

Go, where no Viking has flown before! For the Valkyrie!

Features

• The Norse legends, ironically revisited with fantasy elements;
• 11 regions to fly over, seamlessly connected;
• 4 Flight Skills to master;
• 12 items to research and unlock.
